Original: That request is from the witch Lament.
Once again, she is planning a bizarre
experiment.
[Page]
She wants a [Color:6][Item:1041][Color:0], as was
written of in the book found in the
Echoing Library.
[Page]
Do you know of anywhere that it might
be obtained? Could you find one?
[Page]
Her last experiment involving research
into lightning almost ended in her own
death by electrocution.
[Page]
And I am not sure she has learned her
lesson... Well then, I shall await
your swift return.
Translation: That request is from the witch Lament.
Once again, she is planning a bizarre
experiment.
[Page]
She wants a [Color:6][Item:1041][Color:0], as was
written of in the book found in the

[Page]
Do you know of anywhere that it might

[Page]
Her last experiment involving research

death by electrocution.
[Page]
And I am not sure she has learned her
lesson... Well then, I shall await
your swift return.

Original: Only after taking on the work do
you recall that you already have a
[Color:6][Number:0][Color:0] in your possession.
[Page]
If you wish to complete the request
now, you can report in and deliver
the [Number:0] immediately.
Translation: Only after taking on the work do
you recall that you already have a
[Color:6][Number:0][Color:0] in your possession.
[Page]
If you wish to complete the request
now, you can report in and deliver
the [Number:0] immediately.

Original: Welcome back. Did you find what the
witch Lament sought?
[Page]
Hmm... I wonder what experiment she
could have in mind that requires this.
Whatever it is... I hope it is safe.
[Page]
Here is your reward, as promised.
How do you suppose the client finds
the money to pay for these requests?
Translation: Welcome back. Did you find what the

Whatever it is... I hope it is safe.
[Page]

Original: You recall accepting a request at the
bar to deliver a [Color:6][Item:1041][Color:0]...
[Page]
All that is left now is to deliver
the newly acquired fist to the bar
and the request is complete!
Translation: You recall accepting a request at the
bar to deliver a [Color:6][Item:1041][Color:0]...
[Page]

Original: You suddenly recall accepting a
request to deliver a [Color:6][Item:1041][Color:0]
to a client...
[Page]
You must take care not to accidentally
sell the one in your possession.
